description: <p>Staff Nurse/Senior Staff Nurse<br />£25,545 - £31,024 per annum<br />Stagenhoe Neurological Care Centre, SG4 8BY<br />3 shifts x 12.5 hours per week, 07.45-20.45<br /><br />Sue Ryder, Stagenhoe Park, Hitchin have an amazing opportunity for a Staff Nurse/Senior Staff Nurse to join our well established and dedicated team of Healthcare Professionals.<br /><br />Stagenhoe is a Sue Ryder specialist neurological care centre based in Hertfordshire, caring for people aged 18 and over a range of neurological conditions. At Stagenhoe, we provide the care people need to optimise their health and wellbeing, maximise their independence and support their emotional and social needs.<br /><br />We offer a huge range of support, from long-term residential care in our 45-bed centre to short-stay respite care. Short stays can be for a few days or a few weeks, depending on the needs of the individual.<br /><br />**NHS Holiday accrual honoured**<br /><br />Enhancements:<br />8.00 pm to 6.00 am (nights) 30%<br />Friday midnight to Sunday midnight (weekends 45%<br />Public Holidays 24 hours midnight to midnight 60%<br /><br />You will be:<br />•Registered Nurse, preferably with experience in neurological or specialist palliative care<br />•Relevant post-registration training or willing and able to gain within 1 year<br />•An ability to demonstrate a commitment to continued professional development<br />•Awareness of current legislation within independent care sector<br />•Completion of NMC recognised accredited mentor training and able to mentor students and less experienced staff<br />•We offer a huge range of support, from long-term residential care in our 45-bed centre to short-stay respite care. Short stays can be for a few days or a few weeks, depending on the needs of the individual.<br /><br />See below for just some of the many benefits available as a Sue Ryder employee:<br /><br />*We will honour NHS service when calculating annual leave up to 30 days + b/h<br />*£3,600 Retention bonus, paid in 12 monthly instalments<br />*Continuation of NHS pension when coming direct from NHS<br /><br />• 25 days holiday rising to 30 with service plus bank holidays<br />• Private pension matched at 5%<br />• Enhanced Maternity Benefits<br />• 24 hour employee assistance line for free advice on work, family and personal life<br />• PeoplePerks - discounts with hundreds of retailers and services that can amount to an average annual saving of GBP 350<br />• Staff discount of 15% on new goods at the online shop<br />• Free onsite parking and good transport links<br />• Susidised meals<br />• Staff loans and company car loans<br />• Free uniform<br />• Wellbeing centre<br />• Opportunities to progress through our development framework structure</p>
